body: I couldnâ€™t help but be a little flattered. The person who had known me longer than anyone else in the area was apparently in love with me. That must have said something good about me, right?

I took in a deep sigh, looking up at the ceiling as I thought about us and--No. No not at all please no. Especially not if this was how she wanted to ask me out... I guess I wasn't used to being the one getting the attention.
